testsuite.name: features.Form_authentification.Positive test cases for login page

testcase.classname: features.Form_authentification.Positive test cases for login page
testcase.name: User is able to login with valid credentials and then logout
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: User is able to login with valid credentials and then logout Given I navigate to "login_page" page ... passed in 0.000s Given I enter valid "tomsmith" username ... passed in 0.000s And I enter valid "SuperSecretPassword!" password ... passed in 0.000s And I click on "login" button ... passed in 0.000s Then I should see "You logged into a secure area!" success login message ... passed in 0.000s Then I click on "logout" button ... passed in 0.000s And should see "You logged out of the secure area!" success logout message ... passed in 0.005s Then I close "browser" ... passed in 0.000s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
